item.title: ‘In a Violent Nature 2’ Starts Production in September in Canada (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: “In a Violent Nature 2,” the sequel to the 2024 slasher film, will start production in September in Canada. The original “In a Violent Nature,” written and directed by Chris Na
